name: CRT Level Editor
description:
Basic Level Editor for CRT! 

Hello everyone, I decided to put together a little editor that you can play with!

  • Build a level!
  • Beat the level!
  • Share the level!

To save a level - Once you beat a level you have made, the level data will be displayed in the text box at the bottom. Post your level data in the comments below for other people to try out! 

To load a level - simple copy and paste the level data into the text box and click the load button! 

Controls - 

Placing Tiles - Click the tile you want to use at the bottom 

Left Mouse - Place Tile

Right Mouse - Delete Tile

Rotating Spiked Tiles - Once you place a spike tile use the Mouse Wheel to rotate

Toggle Edit / Play Mode - Enter

Movement - Arrow Keys 

Fullscreen - 'F' Key

I think it runs better in fullscreen! 

Thanks for checking it out! :D
